scripts.predev: node -e "const [major] = process.versions.node.split('.').map(Number); if (major < 20) { console.error('This project requires Node.js >=20. Please switch with: nvm use 20'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.prepreview: node -e "const [major] = process.versions.node.split('.').map(Number); if (major < 20) { console.error('This project requires Node.js >=20. Please switch with: nvm use 20'); process.exit(1); }"
